detail.content: Dual radial-mount, opposed 4-piston calipers
With dual semi-floating 330mm discs, KIBS ABS
Trellis, high-tensile steel, with swingarm mounting plate
12 Month Limited Warranty
636cc inline-four engine offers racetrack-ready on the street
3-mode KTRC traction control tuned to cover a wide-range of riding
Showa Separate Function Fork Big Piston (SFF-BP) offers broad
FCC clutch with assist and slipper functions offers light clutch pull
And minimizes wheel chatter caused by aggressive downshifting
Kawasaki Intelligent anti-lock Brake System (KIBS) ABS
Smooth Power: Compact 296cc parallel-twin engine
Delivers smooth response and strong acceleration
New and exclusive: wider 150mm rear tire, taller windshield
The imposing stealth-like matte black color and graphic scheme
A snowflake with the Japanese symbol for winter
For more features, visit the Ninja® 300 ABS product page
Fuel-injected 52-degree 1,700cc V-twin delivers high torque levels
Electronic cruise control system can be activated in third gear
Stylish, frame-mounted fairing keeps steering feel light
Comes with a 36-month limited warranty
New fuel injection system for easier starting at all elevations
improved fuel economy and maximum performance
Adjustable front and rear suspension for a customized ride
Low seat height and ergonomics to rider confidence and comfort
